pricing.title: Pricing & Plans - Gridix | From $129/month

contacts.title: Contact Gridix Support | 24/7 Help in 5 Minutes
contacts.description: Need help? Our support team responds within 5 minutes, 24/7. Contact us via Telegram. Professional technical support for all your questions.

partner-program.title: Partner Program - Earn up to 50% Commission | Gridix
partner-program.description: Become a Gridix partner and earn 20-50% commission. Help developers sell faster with interactive floor plans. Flexible partnership levels, marketing materials included.
partner-program.keywords: partner program, affiliate, commission, real estate partnership, developer tools reseller, earn with gridix

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy - Gridix | Data Protection & GDPR
privacy-policy.description: Learn how Gridix protects your data. GDPR compliant, secure data storage, transparent privacy practices. Your data security is our priority.
privacy-policy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, GDPR, security, data privacy, confidentiality

refund-policy.title: Refund Policy - Gridix | 7-Day Money Back Guarantee

refund-policy.keywords: refund policy, money back guarantee, subscription refund, cancellation policy
